bibl.title: Egypt in the Age of Cleopatra: History and Society under the Ptolemies. Translated from the French by David LORTON.
bibl.note: Éd. originale: L'Égypte au temps de Cléopâtre, 180-30 av. J.-C. = La Vie Quotidienne. Antiquité (Paris, 1997).
bibl.seg: CHAUVEAU Michel, Egypt in the Age of Cleopatra: History and Society under the Ptolemies. Translated from the French by David LORTON.
Ithaca, New York, Cornell University Press, 2000, 8°, 240 pp., ill. ISBN 0-8014-8576-2. $17.95.
Éd. originale: L'Égypte au temps de Cléopâtre, 180-30 av. J.-C. = La Vie Quotidienne. Antiquité (Paris, 1997).
